ti.problem_state_summary: The problem involves interpreting a clock diagram to determine the time shown. The task is to find a time word that completes the phrase 'It is (_) after eight.' The clock face is a diagram with numbers representing hours, and the positions of the clock hands need to be interpreted. The problem provides multiple-choice options for the time word. The time is known to be after eight, and the correct time word must fit this context. The exact positions of the clock hands are crucial to determine the correct time word.
required_operations: Interpret the positions of the clock hands
Determine the time word that fits 'It is (_) after eight.'
Map the determined time word to one of the provided options

multiple_choice.answer_format: Return final as option label or exact value per instruction

selected_skills.name: map_length_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: To map the determined time word to one of the provided multiple-choice options.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the skill to match the interpreted time word with the correct option label from the multiple-choice options.

new_skill_specs.name: interpret_clock_hands
new_skill_specs.purpose: Interpret the positions of the clock hands to determine the time word that fits 'It is (_) after eight.'
edge_cases: When the minute hand is exactly on a quarter mark.
When the hour hand is exactly on an hour mark.
